channel.title: How do i get my server up so other people can join?
channel.description: IVE TRYED HAMCHI AND NO-IP AND I CANT GET IT UP, CAN SOMEONE HELP???[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 09:07:47 PM[/size][hr].............[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 09:11:44 PM[/size][hr]someone said something about front port or something[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 09:13:47 PM[/size][hr]omg..

item.title: How do i get my server up so other people can join?
item.dc:creator: @OnYx OnYx
item.description:
@OnYx wrote:

If you are using Hamachi, create some ports for your server and click on “runserver” then log on to your server and if u get on okay, people just then be able to get on your server.

Read full topic
